alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 9:51AM CDT until July 14 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 950 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Brady, or 21 miles northeast of Curtis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Brady, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area and Vroman. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 193 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
